Content.Title: Political Memoirs Committee
Content.Synopsis: Recorded coverage of the Public Administration Committee hearing on Political Memoirs, from Thursday 17th November. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Prime Minister's Questions
Content.Synopsis: Recorded coverage of questions in the House of Commons to Prime Minister Tony Blair. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: The Record Europe
Content.Synopsis: Shirin Wheeler presents a review of the last three months in Strasbourg and Brussels. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Security of Gas Supply Committee
Content.Synopsis: Recorded coverage of the Trade and Industry Committee hearing on the security of gas supply, with evidence from Ofgem and Malcolm Wicks, from Monday 31st October. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Commons Terrorism Debate
Content.Synopsis: Recorded coverage of highlights of the House of Commons debate on the Terrorism Bill, from Wednesday 9th November. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: The Gunpowder Plot
Content.Synopsis: Timewatch investigates how 400 years ago the plot to blow up King James I and Parliament was uncovered and the Catholic conspirators executed. Why did these men become so desperate?

Content.Title: Pandemic Influenza Committee
Content.Synopsis: The Lords Science and Technology Committee hearing on pandemic influenza, with evidence from the Health Minister Rosie Winterton, from Tuesday 1st November. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Westminster Hall
Content.Synopsis: Recorded coverage of the House of Commons debate in Westminster Hall on the provision of herceptin, from Tuesday 1st November. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: The Record Europe
Content.Synopsis: Shirin Wheeler looks at the work of the European Court of Justice. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Transport Security Committee
Content.Synopsis: The Transport Committee hearing on financial protection for air travellers and transport security, from Wednesday 2nd November. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Welsh Assembly
Content.Synopsis: Recorded coverage of the debate in the Welsh Assembly on Council Tax, from Wednesday 12th October. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Welsh Assembly
Content.Synopsis: Continued recorded coverage of the debate in the Welsh Assembly on Council Tax, from Wednesday 12th October. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Parliament in the Public Eye
Content.Synopsis: Recorded coverage of the House of Lords debate on the Hansard Society Report "Members Only? Parliament in the Public Eye" from Thursday 3rd November. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Today in Parliament
Content.Synopsis: A day in the life of the Today in Parliament team in this their 60th anniversary year. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: The Record
Content.Synopsis: Tessa Duggleby presents a review of the last three months in Westminster. Parliament is currently in recess.

Content.Title: Scottish Parliament
Content.Synopsis: Recorded coverage of highlights of the Scottish Parliament debate on the Licensing Bill, from Wednesday 16th November. Parliament is currently in recess.
